data.prayer: Jesus, purify the 3,625 believers in the state of West Kazakhstan to not just be hearers, but doers of your Word.
data.verse: Blessed is the one who reads aloud the words of this prophecy, and blessed are those who hear it and take to heart what is written in it, because the time is near.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of West Kazakhstan, Kazakhstan

data.prayer: Pour your Spirit out on the 618,300 citizens of West Kazakhstan, Kazakhstan, so that they might know your name and the name of your Son.
data.verse: And afterward, I will pour out my Spirit on all people. your sons and daughters will prophesy, your old men will dream dreams, your young men will see visions.

data.prayer: Lord, let it be said of the 614,675 lost in West Kazakhstan that you have called them out of darkness into your glorious light.
data.verse: But you are a chosen race, a royal priesthood, a holy nation, a people for God’s own possession, that you may proclaim the excellence of him who called you out of darkness into his marvelous light

data.prayer: Father, convict the 3,625 believers in West Kazakhstan to be holy and righteous. Inspire them to gather in small groups for accountability and spiritual growth.
Lord God, I thank you that the blood of Christ, who through the eternal Spirit offered himself without defect to God, can cleanse the Lak people conscience from dead works to serve the living God.
Father, please send new evangelists into the harvest in the state of West Kazakhstan, Kazakhstan.
data.verse: Ask the Lord of the harvest, therefore, to send out workers into his harvest field.

data.prayer: God, we ask you to raise up elders and deacons from the 3,625 believers in West Kazakhstan, who will serve the church and equip it to do your work.
data.verse: So Christ himself gave the apostles, the prophets, the evangelists, the pastors and teachers, to equip his people for works of service, so that the body of Christ may be built up until we all reach unity in the faith and in the knowledge of the Son of God and become mature, attaining to the whole measure of the fullness of Christ.

data.prayer: Spirit, teach those feeling unsafe in West Kazakhstan, Kazakhstan that they can hide under your wings
data.verse: He will cover you with his feathers, and under his wings you will find refuge; his faithfulness will be your shield and rampart.
